DOC.brief_summary: In study investigator want evaluate satiety two infant formula , one containing prebiotics contain synbiotics . Rate weight gain , proxy measurement healthy development infant , assess group compare growth observe WHO Child Growth Standards order demonstrate non inferiority .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Synbiotics-containing Starter Formula Infant Growth
DOC.detailed_description: Growth study continue centrepiece clinical evaluation infant formula . In order standardize growth , investigator proposes calculate weight-for-age Z-score related WHO Child Growth Standards . Z-scores express difference measurement individual median value reference population proportion SD reference population take account age gender . The hypothesis test infant feed starter formula prebiotics probiotic blend feed probiotic grow much infant reference growth WHO . Other parameter digestive tolerance , frequency morbidity microbiota pattern also investigate .
DOC.criteria: Healthy newborn infant Age point enrolment ≤14 day Birthweight ≥2500g ≤4500g Full term infant ≥37 week gestation ≤42 week gestation Singleton birth Having obtain his/her his/her legal representative 's informed consent Congenital illness malformation may affect normal growth Significant prenatal postnatal disease Rehospitalisation 2 day first 14 day life ( Exceptionally , infant hospitalize jaundice may enrol study . ) Receiving infant formula contain probiotic and/or prebiotics prior enrollment and/or time enrollment Patient expect comply treatment Currently participate participate another clinical trial prior begin study
